sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-app>
    <provider>
      <transition
        name="fade"
        appear
        mode="out-in"
      >
        <layout
        />
      </transition>
    </provider>
  </v-app>
</template>

<script>
import "@fontsource/montserrat";
import "@fontsource/alkalami"
import Provider from "@/context/Provider.vue";
import TheLoader from "@/components/TheLoader.vue";

const layout = () => ({
  component: import("@/layouts/page/DefaultPageLayout.vue"),
  loading: TheLoader,
  timeout: 3000
});

export default {
  name: 'App',
  components: {
    TheLoader,
    Provider,
    layout
  },
  computed: {
    layout() {
      //@ts-ignore
      const layoutName = this.$route.meta.layout || "DefaultPageLayout";
      let layout = import(`@/layouts/page/${layoutName}.vue`);
      //@ts-ignore
      return () => layout;
    },
  },
  data: () => ({
    isLoaded: false
  }),
};
</script>
